detail_desc: Mesh sports bag with two handles. Size 15x40x43 cm.
Top in a patterned weave with adjustable shoulder straps with a decorative bow and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem.
Hat in braided paper straw with an embroidered text motif on the brim. Width of brim approx. 14.5 cm.
Jersey body with a yoke, long, mesh sleeves and a lined gusset with press-studs.

Playsuit in a crinkled viscose weave with a V-neck and knot detail at the front and long trumpet sleeves with inset hemstitch embroidery at the top. Elasticated seam at the waist and short, wide legs. Lined at the bottom.

Short turtleneck jumper in a soft rib knit with long raglan sleeves. Decorative sewn-on, fine-knit trims down the front and sleeves.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps, one with a flounce trim, a V-neck with a discreet button at the top and a wrapover front. Elastication and a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with flounces. Narrow shoulder straps, one with a flounce trim, a V-neck with a discreet button at the top and a wrapover front. Elastication and a tie at the waist, and an asymmetric hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Cotton twill cap with an embroidered appliqué on the front and peak. Ties at the back.
STUDIO COLLECTION. Long, chunky-knit jumper in sturdy cotton with a small stand-up collar with a roll edge, long, wide trumpet sleeves and high slits in the sides.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.

Short dress in a patterned crêpe weave with an open back and ties at the back of the neck. Long sleeves with an opening and tie at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared, tiered skirt. Unlined.

Patterned silk handkerchief. Size 33x33 cm.
Silk tie. Width 7 cm.
Sports jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front and stripes in a contrasting colour with press-studs that can be opened all the way down the sleeves.

Biker jacket with a diagonal zip down the front and notch lapels with press-studs. Zipped chest pocket and side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front, one inner pocket and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.

Romper suit in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with a print motif on the back, kangaroo pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hems. Press-studs on the shoulders and concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs.

Weekend bag in rubber with nylon details. Two handles and a zip at the top, a detachable, adjustable shoulder strap, one outer compartment and one inner compartment, both with a zip. Studs on the base. Lined. Size approx. 20x26x43 cm.
Straight-cut, slightly longer shirt in cotton poplin with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Long lace dress with a small, scalloped stand-up collar, an open section and concealed zip at the back and scalloped, butterfly sleeves. Seam at the waist with a gently flared asymmetric skirt which is longer at the back. Satin lining.
